title: Godzilla
description: A prehistoric monster, Godzilla, is awakened by nuclear tests in the Pacific.

title: Godzilla Raids Again
description: Godzilla returns to menace Japan, and the Japanese military must put an end to his reign of terror.

title: King Kong vs. Godzilla
description: Godzilla emerges from an iceberg to do battle with the giant prehistoric monster Kong.

title: Mothra vs. Godzilla
description: Godzilla battles Mothra, who hatches a pair of twins who continue the battle against the monster.

title: Ghidorah, the Three-Headed Monster
description: Godzilla, Rodan and Mothra team up to battle King Ghidorah, a powerful space monster.
alternateNames: San Daikaijū: Chikyū Saidai no Kessen

title: Invasion of Astro-Monster
description: Aliens from Planet X invade Earth and use mind control to make Godzilla and Rodan fight King Ghidorah.

title: Ebirah, Horror of the Deep
description: Godzilla battles a giant lobster and a terrorist organization in the South Seas.
alternateNames: Gojira, Ebira, Mosura: Nankai no Daikettō

title: Son of Godzilla
description: Scientists on a remote island discover Godzilla's offspring while attempting to perfect a weather-control experiment.
alternateNames: Kaijū-tō no Kessen: Gojira no Musuko

title: Destroy All Monsters
description: All of Earth's monsters are imprisoned on an island. When a race of aliens releases them, the monsters attack cities around the world.

title: All Monsters Attack
description: A boy's dreams of traveling to Monster Island lead him into a real-life adventure involving criminals.

title: Godzilla vs. Hedorah
description: Godzilla battles pollution spawned Hedorah, a sludge-like monster with a toxic effect.

title: Godzilla vs. Gigan
description: Godzilla teams up with Anguirus to battle space monsters Gigan and King Ghidorah.
alternateNames: Chikyū Kogeki Meirei: Gojira tai Gigan

title: Godzilla vs. Megalon
description: Godzilla and a robot named Jet Jaguar fight against Megalon and Gigan, two monsters controlled by the undersea nation of Seatopia.

title: Godzilla vs. Mechagodzilla
description: Godzilla battles a robot version of himself, Mechagodzilla, which was created by alien invaders.

title: Terror of Mechagodzilla
description: Godzilla comes to the rescue when a mad scientist and aliens build a new Mechagodzilla to destroy Earth.

title: The Return of Godzilla
description: Thirty years after the original monster's rampage, a new Godzilla emerges and attacks Japan.

title: Godzilla vs. Biollante
description: Godzilla fights a genetically engineered monster called Biollante, which was created from plant cells and Godzilla's own cells.

title: Godzilla vs. King Ghidorah
description: Time travelers use Godzilla in their scheme to destroy Japan to prevent its future economic reign.

title: Godzilla vs. Mothra
description: Mothra and Battra team up to stop Godzilla from destroying Japan.

title: Godzilla vs. Mechagodzilla II
description: Godzilla fights against Mechagodzilla, a robotic version of himself, built by humans to defend against Godzilla.

title: Godzilla vs. SpaceGodzilla
description: Godzilla battles an extraterrestrial clone, SpaceGodzilla, while humans attempt to weaken both creatures.

title: Godzilla vs. Destoroyah
description: Godzilla's heart is melting down, threatening to destroy the Earth, while the mutant creature Destoroyah emerges from the oxygen destroyer weapon that killed the original Godzilla.

title: Godzilla 2000: Millennium
description: Godzilla faces Orga, a massive alien lifeform, in this reboot of the franchise.

title: Godzilla vs. Megaguirus
description: Godzilla faces Megaguirus, a giant dragonfly-like monster, in this alternate continuity.
alternateNames: Gojira tai Megagirasu: Jī Shōmetsu Sakusen

title: Godzilla, Mothra and King Ghidorah: Giant Monsters All-Out Attack
description: Godzilla battles Mothra, King Ghidorah, and Baragon in this standalone entry.
alternateNames: Gojira, Mosura, Kingu Gidora: Daikaijū Sōkōgeki

title: Godzilla Against Mechagodzilla
description: Godzilla battles Kiryu, a mecha built around the bones of the original Godzilla.

title: Godzilla: Tokyo SOS
description: Godzilla battles Mechagodzilla and Mothra in this direct sequel to 'Godzilla Against Mechagodzilla'.
alternateNames: Gojira tai Mosura tai Mekagojira: Tōkyō S.O.S.

title: Godzilla Final Wars
description: Godzilla faces numerous foes in this action-packed finale to the Millennium series.

title: Godzilla
description: Godzilla, awakened from his slumber, emerges to battle the malevolent MUTO creatures and restore balance.

title: Kong: Skull Island
description: A team of scientists and soldiers explore an uncharted island in the Pacific, encountering the mighty Kong and other monstrous creatures.

title: Godzilla: King of the Monsters
description: Godzilla battles against King Ghidorah, Mothra, and Rodan as humanity's existence hangs in the balance.

title: Godzilla vs. Kong
description: Legends collide as Godzilla and Kong, the two most powerful forces of nature, clash in a spectacular battle for the ages.

title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
description: Godzilla and Kong join forces to face a new threat that threatens their world and existence.

title: Shin Godzilla
description: Japan is plunged into chaos upon the appearance of a giant monster.

title: GODZILLA: Planet of the Monsters
description: In the future, humans lose Earth to Godzilla. They plan to take it back.

title: GODZILLA: City on the Edge of Battle
description: The sequel to 'Planet of the Monsters'. Godzilla is faced by a mechanized version of itself.

title: GODZILLA: The Planet Eater
description: The final part of the anime trilogy, where Godzilla faces King Ghidorah.

title: Godzilla Minus One
description: Set in post-war Japan, the country faces a new threat with Godzilla's appearance.
